title: The Hovercraft and the Thorny Hedge

args.text: Toad arrives at a sunny meadow with a bright blue hovercraft. The wind gently stirs the flowers, and the sunlight dapples through the tall, thorny hedge that stretches like a living wall.

args.description: Toad enthusiastically gestures toward the hedge, his eyes wide with excitement as he says 'Poop-poop! To the Open Road!'
Toad attempts to fly the hovercraft over the tall, thorny hedge, but misjudges the height and the craft crashes into the hedge with a loud *sproing!*
The hovercraft becomes stuck in the hedge, tangled like a nest of barbed wire and metal fragments, while Toad is covered in mud and thorns.
Toad looks frustrated, his voice trembling slightly as he mutters, 'This is the most ridiculous thing ever!'
Callie approaches calmly, her movements slow and deliberate. She holds a garden trowel in one hand and a long pole in the other, her eyes focused on the hovercraft and the hedge.
A soft breeze passes through the flowers, and a bee lands gently on Toad's hat, buzzing softly.
The bee lands on Toad's hat and tilts its head, then chirps in a clear, curious tone — 'The most ridiculous thing ever'.
